There may be two bugs here. We should be getting a compilation error for the
given snippet (we should never get to the evaluation). Also, JDIFieldVariable
shouldn't be throwing an NPE.

The first problem was ours. The evaluation engine has checks which discard
compiler errors not occurring in the code snippet - this allows the evaluation
to continue when there are unavoidable problems in the generated evaluation
source code. However, there was a problem in the code snippet generation such
that the offsets used to detect if an error occurred inside the snippet were
failing.

This has been fixed.
